analysis.description: WWCToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol#321-328) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol:
	Contract WWCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

WWCToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol#298-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol#300)

WWCToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol#321-328)
	- /unique_chucks/32/0xae1afc573654ec294e277c7c723f29e799528a87.sol#326-327
